name: Extreme MaxSpeed Car
description:
Extreme MaxSpeed Caris a unique drift car racing game and designed for those gamers who are looking for car racing simulator games. Compete in jet car race and knockdown your racing rivals. Drive faster than crazy rivals cars to become the ultimate drift king in super sports championship. The most amazing drift car racing games 3D have more than one impossible tracks 3D to do some racing challenges and become a real car drifting simulator.
Features:
Ultra car racing in multiple race tracks to knock out rivals
Upgrade sports cars and unlock multiple asphalt circuit tracks
Powerful engine sounds and auto drift car mods
Realistic feel with amazing control and dynamic speed meter
Highly detailed controls like manual gearbox and console quality 3D graphics
